critique: The document is an executive order adjusting rates of pay and allowances for various government employees and members of the uniformed services. As the President, the primary emotion I want to elicit is joy, as people will be getting paid more. There might be some surprise at the adjustments, but overall, the goal is to convey a sense of stability and satisfaction. There is no indication of sadness, fear, or disgust. The language is formal and factual, so the intensity of any emotion is likely to be moderate.
